titleStmt.title: An epitome of the title that the Kynges Maiestie of Englande, hath to the souereigntie of Scotlande continued vpon the auncient writers of both nacions, from the beginnyng.
titleStmt.author: Bodrugan, Nicholas.

publicationStmt.publisher: In aedibus Richardi Graftoni, typographi regii],
publicationStmt.date: M.D.XLVIII. [1548] Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon.
Running title reads: The Kynges title to Scotlande.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
